column1: Art Institute of Chicago//// Â  The general admission is $25
column2: so a bit of a pricey attraction
column3: but you get A LOT for what you pay for. I don't even think we hit every room and we were there for over an hour. It's easy to get lost in here
column4: but even easier to get lost in its beauty. There are multiple floors that are categorized by whatever art you may be interested in.
